title: Park Youth

cornerstone.heading: Wednesday Night: Cornerstone
paragraphs: Cornerstone is our youth group for secondary school age, meeting every Wednesday at church from 6:00pm-7:00pm.
We spend time together in Scripture, discussion, prayer, and friendship.

image.alt: Park Youth group together inside church

sunday_study.heading: Sunday: Faith Explorers
paragraphs: We also run a youth Bible study during selected Sunday gatherings for Years 7-10.
Our heart is to help young people know Jesus, grow in faith, and play a full part in church life.
